intro: Psychotria baviensis, commonly known as the Bavi Psychotria, is a flowering plant species native to Vietnam. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It is often found in moist, shaded environments such as tropical forests. The species is of interest to botanists due to its potential ecological and medicinal significance.
